/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/model_loader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/ppc.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o hard_shadow   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libtinyobj.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
